activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as a splash screen that checks for a specific intent extra (`OPEN_NOTE_ID`). If the extra is present, it starts `MainActivity` with the extra data; otherwise, it starts `MainActivity` without any extra data. After starting `MainActivity`, the `SplashActivity` is finished.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_property.effect: Provides a top-level container for the activity's UI, coordinating the layout of child views.
Displays the activity's toolbar, which contains menu items for actions like saving, searching, creating notes, and accessing settings.
Organizes child views in a vertical linear layout, ensuring proper alignment and spacing.
Embeds the search bar layout, enabling search functionality within the activity.
Manages the display of multiple notes in a swipeable interface, allowing users to navigate between notes.
Provides visual indicators for the current note's position within the ViewPager, aiding navigation.
Provides a top-level container for the activity's UI, coordinating the layout of child views.
Displays the activity's toolbar, which contains menu items for actions like saving, searching, creating notes, and accessing settings.
Organizes child views in a vertical linear layout, ensuring proper alignment and spacing.
Embeds the search bar layout, enabling search functionality within the activity.
Manages the display of multiple notes in a swipeable interface, allowing users to navigate between notes.
Provides visual indicators for the current note's position within the ViewPager, aiding navigation.

activities.summary: The activity serves as the main interface for managing notes, including creating, editing, deleting, and viewing notes. It supports various note types (text and checklist), handles file imports/exports, manages search functionality, and integrates with system features like shortcuts, printing, and sharing. Additionally, it provides options for locking/unlocking notes, sorting checklists, and managing app settings.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.WidgetConfigureActivity

dynamic_property.effect: serves as the root layout for the widget configuration activity.
organizes the main UI elements for widget configuration.
holds the note picker UI elements.
holds the checkbox for toggling note title visibility.
toggles the visibility of the note title in the widget.
displays text indicating the note picker's purpose.
displays the currently selected note for the widget.
displays the title of the note shown in the widget.

static_properties.text: Thank you for using Simple Notes.\nFor more simple apps please visit SimpleMobileTools.com.

dynamic_property.effect: displays the content of the note shown in the widget.
displays checklist items if the note type is a checklist.
displays the current background color of the widget.
holds the seekbar for adjusting background transparency.
adjusts the transparency of the widget's background color.
displays the current text color of the widget.
saves the widget configuration and exits the activity.

activities.summary: The `WidgetConfigureActivity` is responsible for configuring the appearance and content of a widget in the Simple Notes Pro app. It allows users to customize the widget's background color, text color, and transparency, as well as select which note to display in the widget. The activity also handles the visibility of the note title, manages note selection, and updates the widget's configuration. Key functionalities include color picking, note selection, widget background and text color customization, and saving the widget configuration.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.AboutActivity
activities.summary: This activity provides information about the app, including its version, developer details, and links to related resources such as the app's website, source code, and developer contact.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.CustomizationActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for customizing various settings in the application, including theme, color, and other user interface preferences.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.notes.pro.activities.SettingsActivity

dynamic_property.effect: Opens the color customization activity.
Opens the widget color customization activity.
Toggles the use of English language and exits the app.
Opens the language selection activity.
Opens a dialog to select font size.
Toggles the display of word count.
Toggles the clickable state of links and emails.
Toggles the use of monospaced font.
Toggles the incognito mode of keyboards.
Toggles the line wrap feature.
Opens a dialog to select text alignment.

static_properties.text: Place cursor to the end of note

dynamic_property.effect: Toggles the placement of the cursor to the end of the note.
Toggles the visibility of the keyboard on startup.

static_properties.text: Show a note picker on startup

dynamic_property.effect: Toggles the display of the note picker on startup.
Toggles the autosave notes feature.
Toggles the display of save success messages.
Opens a dialog to export notes.
Opens a dialog to import notes.
Toggles the automatic backups feature.
Opens a dialog to manage automatic backups.

activities.summary: This activity is used for configuring various settings in the app, including color customization, language, font size, text alignment, autosave, keyboard visibility, note picker, word count, line wrap, cursor placement, incognito mode, widget colors, notes export/import, and automatic backups. It also handles the management and display of these settings through user interactions.
